bioAsHtml: Narek Asadorian is a Senior Software Engineer with Salesforce, where he works on streaming data pipelines and data enrichment microservices in support of the Salesforce Inbox and Einstein Activity Capture products. He is a Scala programmer and all-around functional programming advocate. Narek is also the organizer of Salesforce's internal programming meetup, #lambda. In his free time, he enjoys making electronic music and fine dining.
